Index.title: this is example
Index.description: Welcome to the Next.js Internationalization (i18n) example! This demo showcases the power of the App Router and how to manage multilingual content seamlessly using next-intl.

NotFoundPage.title: Page Not Found
NotFoundPage.description: Oops! It seems like you've stumbled upon a page that doesn't exist. Don't worry, our internationalization magic is still hard at work on other parts of the app. Feel free to navigate back to explore more!

SuccessPage.orderConfirmed: Your order has been successfully confirmed.
SuccessPage.nextSteps: You will receive an email with your order details shortly. In the meantime, feel free to track your order status in your account.
SuccessPage.customerSupport: Need help? Contact our customer support at Info@pharmasolutionskw.com or call us at #######.

customerReview.yourFeedback: Your feedback helps us improve. Tell us about your experience!

aboutUs.descriptionEmergencyServices: We provide 24/7 emergency services to ensure the safety and well-being of our clients at all times.
aboutUs.descriptionVisionarySolutions: Our vision is to innovate and deliver solutions that drive progress and create a better future.
aboutUs.descriptionCommitmentToCare: We are committed to providing the highest quality care and ensuring the well-being of our clients.
aboutUs.descriptionHealthAndWellness: Promoting health and wellness through comprehensive healthcare solutions and services.
aboutUs.descriptionPharmaceuticalExcellence: Delivering pharmaceutical products and services with a focus on quality and efficacy.
aboutUs.descriptionSupportingCauses: We support various causes and initiatives to make a positive impact on society.
aboutUs.introduction: At Pharmacy Solutions, we believe in empowering individuals to take control of their health and well-being. Founded on the principles of care, quality, and convenience, we strive to provide our customers with the best possible experience when it comes to their pharmaceutical needs.
aboutUs.location: Pharmacy Solutions is a pharmacy located in Sharq, dedicated to providing pharmaceutical products to customers and their families in Kuwait. We serve our customers both online and through our physical locations.
aboutUs.productRange: We offer a wide range of pharmaceutical products, including prescription medications and over-the-counter products such as skincare, hair care, vitamins, nutritional supplements, baby care, and healthcare products.
aboutUs.vision: Our vision is to improve health, well-being, and beauty for our community in Kuwait.
aboutUs.mission: Our mission emphasizes integrity, honesty, and strong work ethics while prioritizing relationships with our community.

collaborations.partnersDescription: We partner with trusted healthcare providers and leading pharmaceutical companies to deliver top-quality products and services for the well-being of our community.

terms.welcome: Welcome to Pharmacy Solutions website. By using our services, you agree to the following terms:
terms.term1: All purchases require a valid prescription from a licensed healthcare provider.
terms.term2: We do not sell controlled substances or recreational drugs.
terms.term3: Prices and availability are subject to change without notice.
terms.term4: We are not responsible for any adverse reactions or interactions. Consult your doctor before use.
terms.term5: Refunds are only available for unopened, undamaged products within 14 days of purchase.
terms.term6: Shipping times may vary. We are not responsible for delays outside our control.
terms.term7: Your personal and medical information will be kept confidential in accordance with our Privacy Policy.
terms.term8: We reserve the right to refuse service to anyone for any reason.
terms.term9: By using this website, you agree to comply with all applicable laws and regulations.
terms.term10: These terms may be updated at any time. Continued use of the site constitutes acceptance of any changes.
terms.agreement: By using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.

FormErrors.nameMin: Name must be at least 3 characters
